name: Import ConvertKit subscribers from Google Sheets
description: Every time a new prospect is added to your Google Sheets spreadsheet, Make will automatically add it as a subscriber in ConvertKit. This template use [this example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fhTcN7a-7QZJfdj6ARwL1XpiZPsUSYHcgU_zom9ZYiw/edit?usp=sharing).
